
# Download modis files MOD44B version 051

There is a folder for each continent and in each folder a file "Download.txt" with the files to be downloaded I made a subset for each continent using the tool <http://reverb.echo.nasa.gov>

```{r setup, eval=TRUE}

source("R/power_fun.r")

```

```{r SADownload, eval=F}


dataDir <- "~/Dropbox1T/GlobalCriticalForest/southamerica/"

# Download
# dm <- down_modis(dataDir,9,14)

# Generate mosaics

mosaic_modis(dataDir,9,14)


```

```{r NA, eval=T}

#
# North America

dataDir <- "~/Dropbox1T/GlobalCriticalForest/northamerica"
```
